titleStmt.title: A prophesie written long since for this yeare, 1641 wherein prelate-policie is proved to be folly : as also, many notable passages concerning the fall of some great church-men / written by a modern poet.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to George Wither. cf. NUC pre-1956.
